52.title: Episode #6.52
52.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Not So Happy Campers: Part 1
1.plot: The campers arrive and learn that instead of chilling in a gorgeous mansion, they'll be spending the next eight weeks at dingy old Camp Wawanakwa.

2.title: Not So Happy Campers: Part 2
2.plot: The campers must jump off of an insanely high cliff into shark-infested waters, then carry a cartload of materials back to the campgrounds and build a hot tub from scratch. The losers will send their first camper down the Dock of Shame.

3.title: The Big Sleep
3.plot: The campers face off in an epic "awake-a-thon".

4.title: Dodgebrawl
4.plot: The campers face off in the classic school-yard-blood-bath.

5.title: Not Quite Famous
5.plot: The campers step on stage for the most dramatic elimination competition yet!

6.title: The Sucky Outdoors
6.plot: An overnight camping trip into the woods brings out the crazy in Izzy.

7.title: Phobia Factor
7.plot: Each camper is forced to face his or her worst fear.

8.title: Up the Creek
8.plot: The campers participate in a 3 part canoe race to Boney Island.

9.title: Paintball Deer Hunter
9.plot: The campers are split up into Deer and Hunters, and each team has to go out and bag as many of the other team's deer as possible.

10.title: If You Can't Take the Heat...
10.plot: The two teams must make a 3 course meal for judgment. The Killer Bass, lead by Geoff, prepare an awesome meal and everything runs smoothly.

11.title: Who Can You Trust?
11.plot: Given the growing tensions on both teams, what better way to mess with the campers than force them to trust one another?

12.title: Basic Straining
12.plot: The 11 remaining campers are sent to an insane boot camp.

13.title: X-Treme Torture
13.plot: The campers are challenged to participate in an X-treme Sports Challenge.

14.title: Brunch of Disgustingness
14.plot: The campers have reached the halfway point.

15.title: No Pain No Game
15.plot: The teams are officially dissolved leaving each and every camper to look out for #1. Two returning campers that were eliminated returned to the game.

16.title: Search and Do Not Destroy
16.plot: Argh, maties! This week the camp scallywags set out on ye olde "Scavenger Hunt for Treasure" challenge.

17.title: Hide and Be Sneaky
17.plot: The campers are in for an old fashioned game of Hide N' Seek, with Chef Hatchet.

18.title: Off the Chain
18.plot: The campers are challenged to compete in The Tour de Wawanakwa where they must not only race a treacherous Motor Cross Course, but build their own bicycles using supplies from the Arts & Crafts Lodge.

19.title: Hook Line and Screamer
19.plot: Chris and Chef are nowhere to be found in this spooky episode that has campers watching a horror movie about an escaped Chainsaw Psycho Killer who lives in the woods.

20.title: Wawanakwa Gone Wild!
20.plot: The campers are challenged to become Game Wardens and bag a beast.

21.title: Trial by Tri-Armed Triathalon
21.plot: The campers are paired up in teams again - only these are the most unholy alliances ever dreamt up by Chris.

22.title: Haute Camp-ture
22.plot: Each camper is getting their minutes of fame - or make that, five minutes of shame, when they compete in the Total Drama Island Modeling Challenge.

23.title: Camp Castaways
23.plot: A torrential rainstorm washes away the cabins and Duncan, Gwen and Heather wake up in the middle of Lake Leech with no idea where they are.

24.title: Are We There Yeti?
24.plot: The campers have a rude awakening, literally -- when they wake up in the middle of the wilderness.

25.title: I Triple Dog Dare You
25.plot: In the semi-final round, Heather, Gwen & Owen are forced to play a game of I TRIPLE DOG DARE YOU, a twisted version of "spin the bottle meets truth or dare".

26.title: Season Recap
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

27.title: The Last Episode, Really!
27.plot: It's the finals and there's a surprise in store for our two reigning champs Owen and Gwen.

28.title: Total Drama Drama Drama Drama Island
28.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Monster Cash
1.plot: They're back! Fourteen of our season one competitors have returned for the chance to win... One. Million. Dollars.

2.title: Alien Resurr-Eggtion
2.plot: Fourteen cast mates embark on an epic search for alien eggs in our alien movie-themed challenge, while Chef, a.k.a. Mama Alien, tracks their every move.

3.title: Riot on Set
3.plot: After winning last week's challenge, cute couple Gwen and Trent find themselves with a rather doubtful 'reward' - they're forced to pick teams and compete against each other!

4.title: Beach Blanket Bogus
4.plot: Trent and Gwen have made up after last week's challenge - at least initially, as the teams learn that this week's movie genre is the classic Teen Beach Flick.

5.title: 3:10 to Crazytown
5.plot: During an epic heat wave, the cast are thrust into a Western movie-themed challenge against their will.

6.title: The Aftermath: 1
6.plot: Geoff and Bridgette, our first two cast members ousted from this season's competition, welcome us to the totally off-the-hook Total Drama Action Aftermath show! A live after-show, where they'll be dishing the dirt on everything to do with, that's right - Total Drama Action. Not only are they joined by season one's former competitors, they've also got two very special guests. Izzy and Trent, the last two cast members to lose out on the million bucks, are back to dish the drama and fill us in on what we didn't get to see on the show. As if Izzy's antics, Trent's ...

7.title: Chefshank Redemption
7.plot: A rude awakening finds all the guys and girls locked in their trailers as prep for today's 'Prison Movie Showdown.'

8.title: One Flu Over the Cuckoos
8.plot: The 'campers' are thrown into med-school and forced to cram all night for the medical drama to follow.

9.title: The Sand Witch Project
9.plot: When Chris dramatically drops in on the cast, complete with fake blood spatters, everyone realizes that it's time for the horror movie challenge.

10.title: Masters of Disasters
10.plot: The cast miss DJ's delicious cooking as they are tempted to lose their disgusting lunch on this week's disaster movie-themed challenges.

11.title: Full Metal Drama
11.plot: The Screaming Gaffers are falling apart at the seams, with the ongoing strife between Harold and Duncan only escalating by the day - and everyone annoyed with Leshawna after discovering she lied.

12.title: The Aftermath: 2
12.plot: Geoff and Bridgette welcome us to another super juicy episode of the Total Drama Action Aftermath show!

13.title: Ocean's Eight - or Nine
13.plot: This week's bank heist challenge starts with the teams having to blow a safe and rescue either Owen or Leshawna from within, along with some bank robbing tools.

14.title: One Million Bucks BC
14.plot: Ooga Ooga. Dig up the hatchets everyone because Courtney is back!

15.title: Million Dollar Babies
15.plot: Cue the marching band and prepare to cut the finish ribbon - because its sports movie day on Total Drama Action.

16.title: Dial M for Merger
16.plot: The seven remaining cast mates embark on this week's spy-movie themed challenge as the teams are merged.

17.title: Super Hero-ld
17.plot: There's nothing scarier than waking up to the sound of someone screaming in terror.

18.title: The Aftermath: 3
18.plot: Geoff and Bridgette welcome us to another spectacularly juicy, behind-the-scenes episode of the Total Drama Action Aftermath show! Gossip lives here! As usual, Geoff and Bridgette are joined by season one's ousted competitors, viewer webcams and three long-awaited guests - Heather, Leshawna, and Owen. Of course, Izzy is thrilled to be reunited with Owen, and Owen is thrilled to be reunited with craft services! Only things are about to get even more interesting for this big boy, when he learns of a family secret even larger than he is - that will either make him very ...

19.title: Princess Pride
19.plot: When Chris shows up with a glass combat boot, the contestants know it's time to bust open the conventions of a fairy tale movie.

20.title: Get a Clue
20.plot: And then there were five... The gloves are off and the magnifying glasses are out, as Chris declares this week the mystery movie challenge.

21.title: Rock n' Rule
21.plot: Strap on those air guitars! 'Cause this is the week to rock 'n roll!

22.title: Crouching Courtney, Hidden Owen
22.plot: GONG! It's the girls (Beth and Courtney) versus the boys (Harold and Duncan) as Chris declares this episode's kung fu challenge.

23.title: 2008: A Space Owen
23.plot: The five remaining cast mates embark on a challenge that's 'out of this world', in this week's outer space extravaganza.

24.title: Top Dog
24.plot: Four remaining cast mates embark on this week's animal/buddy flick, forced to bond with creatures of the fur and feather variety.

25.title: Mutiny on the Soundstage
25.plot: It's down to Beth and Duncan, as the competition accelerates into the final episodes...

26.title: Who Wants to Pick a Millionaire?
26.plot: Beth and Duncan are on pins and needles as they're forced to sit through an aftermath show - including grilling from their cast-off team mates about some of the questionable choices they made in the game.

27.title: Celebrity Manhunt's Total Drama Action Reunion Special
27.plot: Celebrity Manhunt is Total Drama's animated spoof of entertainment magazine shows like E-Talk Canada and TMZ.

1.title: Walk Like an Egyptian: Part 1
1.plot: The contestants will be traveling around the world on a questionable jet piloted by Chef. The first competition takes place in Egypt. The contestants are split into 3 teams.

2.title: Walk Like an Egyptian: Part 2
2.plot: It's a race to the Nile with each team designated an item to bring with them to the finish; a camel, a goat, and a stick. The first round of eliminations takes place.

3.title: Super Crazy Happy Fun Time Japan
3.plot: As the teams begin to gel - or not, in the case of the wildly different girls that make up Team Amazon - Chris announces that the competition's next stop will be Japan.

4.title: Anything Yukon Do, I Can Do Better
4.plot: The frozen tundra of the northern Yukon. The challenge: jump ice floes across a frigid waterway, then pull a dogsled to collect your teammates and race to a finish line, all without freezing to death!

5.title: Broadway, Baby
5.plot: New York City. Teams must get baby carriages from the Statue of Liberty's crown and race them through Central Park.

6.title: Aftermath: Bridgette Over Troubled Water
6.plot: The Aftermath Studio. Geoff co-hosts with Blaineley because Bridgette's in the competition, unlike the Peanut Gallery of disgruntled almost-rans - Trent, Justin, Sadie, Katie, Beth and Eva.

7.title: Slap Slap Revolution
7.plot: The German Alps. The teams are dumped into avalanche territory and have to sing softly or risk a 'song-alanche.'

8.title: The Am-AH-zon Race
8.plot: The Peruvian jungle. Heather is miserable, still smarting from the Leshawna beat-down and missing a tooth to boot!

9.title: Can't Help Falling in Louvre
9.plot: Paris - the city of love, and of the Louvre. Chris has hidden pieces of the world's most famous statues throughout the world's most famous museum, and the teams scramble to find and assemble the statues in the museum's renowned pyramid court.

10.title: Newf Kids on the Rock
10.plot: It's an exciting homecoming for Chris, back to his birthplace on the East Coast of Canada and the storied Grand Banks of Newfoundland.

11.title: Jamaica Me Sweat
11.plot: In the plane en route to Jamaica, DJ is sure his luck has changed. With lucky fish Irene at his side, nothing can go wrong. Little does he know he's outlived his usefulness with Alejandro.

12.title: Aftermath: Revenge of the Telethon
12.plot: The Aftermath Set. Tonight Geoff and Bridgette (and their annoying co-host, Blaineley) have a huge task - they need to raise $500,000 so Chris can refuel the plane and get everyone out of Jamaica!

13.title: I See London...
13.plot: The refueled airplane finally makes it to London - and with DJ gone, only two teams remain!

14.title: Greece's Pieces
14.plot: Athens, Greece. Courtney is elated to have Duncan back - and Gwen is a bundle of conflicted nerves since she just kissed her kinda-friend Courtney's boyfriend in the confessional!

15.title: The Ex-Files
15.plot: The challenge: to sneak into Area 51's Black Box warehouse and steal a functioning alien artifact without getting caught by an elite Black Ops security detail.

16.title: Picnic at Hanging Dork
16.plot: Australia. Gwen and Duncan can't believe they survived the last elimination round; both know they're still targets. Alejandro didn't eliminate Duncan because, unlike Tyler, the punk may still be useful. So he leads Duncan into suggesting Alejandro seduce his ex, since it will throw both Courtney and Heather off their games. Courtney can't wait to lose and vote Gwen out - and if that means not doing her personal best, Courtney's willing to make that sacrifice. The challenge: an emu race up the Blue Mountains to Hanging Rock, followed by a bungie-jumping, sheep shearing...

17.title: Sweden Sour
17.plot: The challenge: first, each team must build a mystery object which turns out to be... a Viking ship!

18.title: Aftermath: The 2nd Chance Challenge
18.plot: The Aftermath studio. Geoff is thrilled to announce Blaineley is gone, doing a world tour of countries where Total Drama is a hit. But where's Bridgette?

19.title: Niagara Brawls
19.plot: The contestants have a rather rude awakening on their return home to Canada - because they are dropped into the rushing waters of the Great Lakes, just meters from the destructive wonder of Niagara Falls!

20.title: Chinese Fake-Out
20.plot: The next stop on the show's world-wide tour is exotic China, where Chris announces that each individual will be on their own for a race down the top of the Great Wall.

21.title: African Lying Safari
21.plot: The Serengeti, Tanzania. Duncan is a happy camper - Courtney is gone! It's sweet relief. Blaineley is gone too, but her effects are still being felt as everyone makes snickering comments about Alejandro and Heather's obvious attraction - something they both vehemently deny.

22.title: Rapa Phooey
22.plot: With just four contestants left, the heat is really starting to ratchet up on the battle.

23.title: Awww, DrumHELLer!
23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: Hawaiian Style
24.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

25.title: Planes, Trains and Hot Air Mobiles
25.plot: Without a plane, the contestants find themselves in a manic road-trip race - all the way to the shores of Hawaii...

26.title: Hawaiian Punish!
26.plot: An epic journey up the Big Island's active volcano determines a million dollar winner!

1.title: Bigger. Badder. Brutal-er!
1.plot: We're going back to the island where Total Drama began, for an all-new season with an all-new cast! Since Chris took the show worldwide, Camp Wawanakwa has been abandoned and turned into a toxic nuclear waste dump - the perfect place for a new season of painful, cringe-inducing challenges!

2.title: Truth or Laser Shark
2.plot: As the competition narrows down to twelve, the contestants now face a "Truth or Dare" type of challenge which forces the contestants to either embarrass themselves by saying the truth, or have their entire team be plunged underwater into shark-infested waters. During the challenge, Sam is revealed to have farted on his only date, Brick is revealed to have wet his pants on his first and last day of school one year, and B's full name is revealed to be Beverly. After a dip in the water in the midst of the challenge, Scott inadvertently begins a rivalry with Fang (a large...

3.title: Ice Ice Baby
3.plot: The episode begins with everyone eating at the cafeteria. In there, Mike tries to explain his personality problem by telling everyone that he is role playing, but then admits his disorder at the confessional. The contestants are then taken to the first challenge: to climb up a mountain to the top with your bare hands and feet, or by using stuff from a junk pile that is owned by a giant mutated cockroach. Once they are climbing the mountain, they must avoid the stuff that Chef throws at them. The Toxic Rats manages to get to the top of the mountain first by ...

4.title: Finders Creepers
4.plot: The ten remaining campers compete in a spooky themed challenge where all of them are taken to the forest and must navigate their way to a cemetery, dig and open up a coffin, grab a flashlight from inside the coffin and find their way around the forest while racing to the finish line. Throughout the challenge, they encounter several mutated animals and eventually a giant pink spider that attacks and captures all of the contestants except Mike, Cameron and Anne Maria. Due to Mike's severe disorder, his Vito personality continues to attract Anne Maria and soon causes her...

5.title: Backstabbers Ahoy!
5.plot: The Rats aren't getting along with Brick, and neither is Jo, who accuses him of switching sides. Meanwhile, Zoey is mad at Mike for his weird "characters" and ditching her for Ann Maria. And after the campers' personal items start disappearing, suspicions are running high all over.

6.title: Runaway Model
6.plot: In this episode, both teams face off in a fashion contest by finding models on the island, also saving Lindsay, after she is kidnapped by Sasquatchinakwa. Scott's rivalry with Fang heats up after he tricks him into falling into one of his own traps, and he later tries to sow some seeds to get Zoey eliminated in the future. Sam goes on a video game frenzy, which almost wins the challenge until Jo, in an anger trip from her looks being laughed at, punches Sasquatchinakwa to save Lindsay and win the challenge, leaving the Rats to vote off Sam. Before Sam is hurled off, ...

7.title: A Mine Is a Terrible Thing to Waste
7.plot: The two teams are sent into an abandoned mine, where Jo takes charge of the Rats, and Mike's disorder gets more out of hand when a fourth personality: Manitoba Smith, makes his debut. Meanwhile, Brick throws the challenge to save his the Maggots, as they were his original team, resulting in another loss for the Toxic Rats. Meanwhile, a still-feral Ezekiel falls in love with Anne Maria, and wins her over by giving her a diamond-like gem. In the end, Brick is voted off for throwing the challenge and Anne Maria quits the competition, thinking she'll be rich with the gem ...

8.title: The Treasure Island of Dr. McLean
8.plot: The campers wake up far from shore, floating on rafts. And new Maggot team member Dakota is starting to mutate, getting taller as her hair grows back ridiculously fast and bright orange to boot. Chris and Chef jet ski out to explain that the challenge has already begun! First, teams must get to shore by any means possible, avoiding the giant mutant squid if they can. The race is on! The squid soon starts to attack Jo and Lightning, who make a deal to work together and go all the way to the finale. Fang sniffs out Scott and leaps onto the Maggots' raft to battle him! ...

9.title: Grand Chef Auto
9.plot: It's merge day! No more teams, just each competitor fighting for survival! To celebrate, Chris crushes the extra team cabin with a pile of concrete left over from building Mt. Chrismore, his giant monument to himself. Cameron tries to form an alliance with Jo, but gets rejected. She's already got her ally: Lightning! Meanwhile, Scott has learned of Mike's multiple personalities and uses this info to blackmail Mike, forcing Mike to help him through the challenges. Otherwise, Scott will tell Zoey all about Mike's little secret!

10.title: Up, Up and Away in My Pitiful Balloon
10.plot: It's down to the final five. With the strongest players now the most likely to get voted off, Scott and Lightning are both serious contenders for the Hurl of Shame. Meanwhile, Lightning is gunning for Jo after shem turned him into shark bait. Zoey is determined to take down Scott for what he did to Mike. Cameron agrees to do Jo's bidding, hoping she'll protect him from everyone else.

11.title: Eat, Puke and Be Wary
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: The Enchanted Fraken-Forest
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Brain vs. Brawn: The Ultimate Showdown
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Heroes vs. Villains
1.plot: Top competitors from past seasons get separated into groups of villains of heroes based on past performances on the show. From then on, they compete against each other to win the 1 million dollar prize.

2.title: Evil Dread
2.plot: The players gather on the beach to dig up 3D puzzle pieces and use them to assemble an international landmark. But that's easier said than done when Alejandro can't use his legs, the rest of his Villainous team refuses to work together, and the Heroes struggle to keep up as Sam flails and a head injury makes Mike lose access to his alternate personalities.

3.title: Saving Private Leechball
3.plot: The Heroic Hamsters and the Villainous Vultures race into the forest to collect unusual paintball weaponry and use it to pick off the other team - last team standing wins! But a straightforward challenge becomes twisty when a Hero makes a villainous move, and a Villain acts decidedly heroic.

4.title: Food Fright
4.plot: Chris combines a pancake eating contest with an obstacle course in the ultimate tummy twister. Meanwhile, sparks fly between newly Villain-ized Courtney and Scott, newly Heroic Duncan has a serious crisis of bad boy confidence, and someone mysteriously breaks Sierra's smartphone, sending her into a serious case of Cody withdrawal.

5.title: Moon Madness
5.plot: During a race across the island, the local wildlife is radically altered by the rare blue harvest moon and even the littlest bunny becomes a blood-thirsty predator. Heather and Alejandro lock horns, Cameron dodges Sierra's deluded affections to help Mike with his newest multiple personality problem, and Gwen is getting more homesick by the minute.

6.title: No One Eggspects the Spanish Opposition
6.plot: The teams travel to Boney Island for an egg hunt inside The Fun Zone, which is anything but fun! New Villain Cameron bonds with Gwen, Heather finally trusts Alejandro enough to team up with him, and Zoey begins to doubt her faith in Mike when she suspects his new malevolent personality is taking control.

7.title: Suckers Punched
7.plot: Chris orchestrates a brutal boxing free-for-all that pits the All-Stars against their biggest, baddest enemies. For most, this means facing off against one of the island's dreaded mutants - but one All-Star has to battle his oldest nemesis, and two best friends are forced to battle each other!

8.title: You Regatta Be Kidding Me
8.plot: The challenge is a simple life-or-death boat race around the island, but things get complicated when Chris messes with the team dynamics. Plus, Zoey puts her life in danger to rescue Mike from his alter ego, and Duncan devises a bad-boy scheme that's downright explosive.

9.title: Zeek and Ye Shall Find
9.plot: The 100th episode celebrations are cut short when Ezekiel kidnaps Chris and the All-Stars head out in search of their host. Meanwhile, Alejandro finds a saboteur in their midst, and a few misplaced kisses have dire consequences.

10.title: The Obsta-Kill Course
10.plot: The All-Stars face the Boot Camp from Hell as they struggle to survive the harshest obstacle course ever. Meanwhile, alliances are pushed beyond their limits, and the two most evil All-Stars wage a war for survival as one finally speaks the truth while the other spins a web of lies.

11.title: Sundae Muddy Sundae
11.plot: The final five All-Stars race to the most dangerous regions of the island to find ingredients for the ultimate sundae. Meanwhile, multiple relationships are shattered when one All-Star's secret plans for ultimate victory are revealed.

12.title: The Bold and the Booty-Ful
12.plot: The Final Four hunt for Pirate Booty and a spot in the Grand Finale in a challenge that becomes truly life-threatening when Mike's malevolent alter ego gets involved.

13.title: The Final Wreck-ening
13.plot: Zoey gives up hope that she'll ever see Mike again and tells Mal the jig is up. With a little help from some of the previously eliminated, Mal and Zoey face off in a horrifying final challenge called Circles of Doom. It causes more chaos than anyone expected and results in the sinking of the island.

14.title: So, Uh, This Is My Team
14.plot: Chris welcomes 14 fresh victims to the new island. Flaws, strengths and outright insanity are put on display during a "build your own accommodations challenge."

15.title: I Love You, Grease Pig
15.plot: A challenge involving a wild boar proves to be more than most can handle, but not for Sugar. Meanwhile, Dave is showing some signs that he might be crushing on a teammate.

16.title: Twinning Isn't Everything
16.plot: Samey and Amy's sisterly hatred reaches a boiling point during a game of doom balloons. Meanwhile, Max gets a little help from a new friend on his quest for pure evil.

17.title: I Love You, I Love You Knots
17.plot: Ella's attempts to befriend Sugar backfire during a wild game of Truth or Scare. Meanwhile, Rodney's delusional love triangle has a huge effect on his team's performance.

18.title: A Blast from the Past
18.plot: Great news: Sky likes Dave! Bad news: Not nearly as much as Dave likes Sky. Spooked by a possible zombie sighting, Shawn bolts and puts his team in jeopardy. A surprise visit from a past competitor raises some very serious questions about a previous elimination.

19.title: Mo Monkey Mo Problems
19.plot: Ella comes up big after Dave puts himself in a dangerous spot trying to show Sky what a good boyfriend he could be. Max tangles with his team's chances to prove his superiority.

20.title: This Is the Pits!
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

21.title: Hurl and Go Seek!
21.plot: Chris merges the teams and feeds them some expired meat before the first nighttime challenge. Dave finally hears what Sky's saying, and Jasmine finally sees how Shawn's feeling. Scarlett learns the truth about Pahkitew Island!

22.title: Scarlett Fever
22.plot: With the island becoming wildly volatile and deadly, Chris sends the teens underground to shut it down. Scarlett has a different plan, and with only minutes to spare before Pahkitew explodes the rest of them have to stop her.

23.title: Sky Fall
23.plot: With Shawn and Jasmine obviously paired up, Sky has no choice but to form an alliance with Sugar. Jasmine and Shawn make a deal to split the money if it's the two of them in the finale... or do they?

24.title: Pahk'd with Talent
24.plot: Chris is feeling pretty lazy so he allows Shawn, Sky and Sugar to each create one challenge. Sky's is about athleticism, Shawn's is about escaping, and Sugar's is alllllll about talent!

25.title: Lies, Cries, and One Big Prize
25.plot: With luck on his side, Shawn gets to bring Jasmine back as his helper. Sky gets stuck with Dave. Halfway through the challenge Jasmine and Dave learn some shocking truths about their partners, and the helpers become hurters!

-1.title: Drama 101
-1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A group of Canadain teenagers compete in a reality show in parody of reality shows. Everything about the genre is parodied here including the challenges, rules, surprise catches, romances, alliances, back-stabbing, eliminations, confessions, and all around insanity.
imdb.title: Total Drama
plot: Animated satire of survivor reality shows featuring random teenage archetypes vying for the final prize by any means necessary.::tb4000

A group of Canadain teenagers compete in a reality show in parody of reality shows. Everything about the genre is parodied here including the challenges, rules, surprise catches, romances, alliances, back-stabbing, eliminations, confessions, and all around insanity.::Hailey-7
